Articles.Content:
There are a lot of smoke particles and engine exhaust looks a bit wierd sometimes. The engine plumes look as if they had shock diamonds in them, but it doesn't make much sense with rocket engines.

Maybe a fixed animation would work better? The engine plume could change and adapt to the pressure instead of having blobs coming out of the engine nozzle. Also the smoke traces could be drawed instead of having particles. What I mean is something like this (except for engines):

Sorry for the low res. I couldn't find anything better.

EDIT: OK, nevermind. Shock diamonds actually do form in rocket engines' exhausts. But still, it would be nice to have some better looking exhaust effects for some of the engines.
